/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. A large white building stands prominently in the background, its flag flying high against the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.
